title: Donald Trump FINALLY Reacts To The Oscars!
text:
Donald Trump has finally spoken out after Sunday night's Oscars !!
In case you missed it, Jimmy Kimmel took a lot of shots at the 70-year-old throughout the show, and even tweeted twice directly at him!
It was amazing!!
Related: Melania Trump Seemingly Has Fun At The White House Governors Ball 
And while Donald Trump Jr. jumped on Twitter on Monday to slam Hollywood's biggest night, the President waited to release his statement in an interview with Breitbart News .
Drumpf responded to the Best Picture snafu, while also slamming the political jokes, saying:
"I think they were focused so hard on politics that they didn't get the act together at the end. It was a little sad. It took away from the glamour of the Oscars. It didn't feel like a very glamorous evening. I've been to the Oscars. There was something very special missing, and then to end that way was sad."
We're surprised he didn't also bring up the Oscars' low ratings , but at least he used the word "sad" twice.
What do U think of Donnie's response??
